sentences.en: Four avenues opened out of the small cavern which the great rock stood in.
sentences.cn: 大岩石所在的岩洞里有四条岔路。

sentences.en: The Spot: The Grand Canyon's Redwall Cavern
sentences.cn: 拍摄现场：大峡谷的红墙洞

sentences.en: This cavern knows no philosophers; its dagger has never cut a pen.
sentences.cn: 这窟窖不知道有哲学，它的尖刀从来没有削过一支笔。
